experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
achievements: Engineered an end-to-end onboarding flow for IRA Retirement, beneficiary, and deceased accounts using React.js and TypeScript, designing a 12-screen user journey that accelerated feature rollout by 40% and improved account activation rates by 15%.

Built a production-grade component library using React, TypeScript, and Storybook, establishing a shared design system across 20+ reusable components and reducing development time by 30% for a 5-engineer team.

Accelerated frontend delivery by 25% through AI-augmented workflows leveraging Claude AI, Cursor IDE, and MCP for automated code generation, debugging, and documentation, including RAG-based context-aware suggestions.

Collaborated with product and engineering stakeholders on system design for real-time data delivery, implementing webhooks, Server-Sent Events (SSE), and polling strategies that reduced dashboard latency by 50% and improved experience for 1,000+ concurrent users.
Architected a micro-frontend infrastructure to decouple feature deployments across four modular services, enabling independent team workflows and improving build scalability by 35%.

Established Test-Driven Development (TDD) practices across the frontend team using Jest and React Testing Library, achieving 85% code coverage through peer reviews and comprehensive testing, reducing production bugs by 45% quarter-over-quarter.
Optimized React application performance through code splitting, lazy loading, and React.memo, reducing bundle size by 35% and improving Time to Interactive by 50% for financial dashboards.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
achievements: Architected an accessible education platform adhering to WCAG 2.1 AAA and WAI-ARIA guidelines, achieving 98% accessibility compliance and enabling 10,000+ students with disabilities to independently access interactive learning content.

Built a reusable component library using React.js and Storybook, reducing development time by 25% and accelerating stakeholder feedback through interactive UI/UX prototypes prior to production deployment.
Developed 30+ interactive educational games and simulations using Test-Driven Development (TDD) with Jest and React Testing Library, maintaining 85% test coverage across K–12 curriculum features.

Designed scalable Higher-Order Components (HOCs) for authentication, data fetching, and analytics tracking, improving component reusability across three partner projects and reducing duplicate code by 20%.

Built SEO-optimized marketing pages using Vue.js with server-side rendering, improving search rankings by 40% and achieving 40% faster initial page loads, contributing to a 25% increase in organic traffic.
Collaborated in Agile ceremonies with cross-functional teams of 8+ members, effectively communicating accessibility requirements and technical constraints during sprint planning and daily stand-ups.

experiences.title: Junior Software Developer
achievements: Modernized a legacy ASP-based application by migrating to a modern React and Node.js stack, leveraging lazy loading and code splitting to reduce page load times by 50%.
Developed an automated billing system using React.js and REST APIs, reducing manual invoicing time by 70% and streamlining financial reporting with real-time bad debt tracking.
Built reusable UI components and internal design patterns for React apps, increasing front-end development efficiency and reducing duplicate code by 25%.
Collaborated with QA and backend teams to resolve cross-functional bugs and improve API reliability, contributing to a 15% reduction in production issues.
Assisted in database schema design and query optimization using MySQL, improving performance of key reporting dashboards by 30%.
Contributed to internal tools such as an employee attendance dashboard and training management portal, improving internal operations and tracking accuracy.
Maintained legacy systems while gradually integrating modern front-end enhancements, ensuring business continuity and stakeholder satisfaction during migration.

projects.title: Latency-Topology-Visualizer
projects.description: A demonstration tool that visualizes cryptocurrency exchange locations on an interactive 3D globe with simulated latency metrics. Features include real exchange data from CoinGecko API, interactive filtering, performance dashboards, and responsive design. Built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, Material-UI, and react-globe.gl.
keyFeatures:
3D globe visualization - Interactive 3D globe using react-globe.gl (WebGL/Three.js)- Exchange markers on the globe
- Connection arcs between exchanges
- Camera controls: rotate, zoom, pan
- Click exchanges to focus the camera

Real exchange data
- Fetches top 15 cryptocurrency exchanges from CoinGecko API
- Real exchange names and geographic locations
- Automatic fallback to mock data if API is unavailable

Interactive filtering and controls
- Filter by cloud provider (AWS, GCP, Azure, Private)
- Filter by specific exchanges
- Adjustable latency range threshold slider
- Toggle visibility of exchanges and connections

Performance metrics dashboard
- Average latency metrics
- Packet loss percentages
- Active connections count
- API credits usage tracking
- Latency alerts system
- 24-hour latency trend chart

User experience
- Responsive design (mobile and desktop)
- Dark theme optimized for data visualization
- Export data as JSON
- Real-time FPS counter
- Smooth animations and transitions

Technical features - TypeScript for type safet - State management with Zustand
- Data fetching with TanStack Query
- Material-UI components
- Next.js 14 App Router

projects.title: AI-Powered Educational Games Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive, personalized learning platform that generates custom educational content using multiple AI models, featuring interactive quizzes, progress tracking, and email result sharing built with Next.js 15, TypeScript, and MongoDB.
keyFeatures: AI Question Generation: Multi-model AI system with automatic fallback for reliable content creation
Personalized Learning: Customizable subjects, difficulty levels, and grade-specific content
Interactive Quiz System: Multiple question types (true/false, multiple choice, short answer)
Progress Tracking: Detailed analytics with subject-wise performance breakdown
Email Integration: Automatic result sharing with parents via email
Responsive Design: Modern UI that works seamlessly across all devices
Custom Questions: Parents can add their own questions for specific topics
Real-time Scoring: Instant feedback and performance calculation

projects.title: Email OTP Verification System
projects.description: A secure, modern two-step email verification system with a 5-minute OTP expiration built using Next.js 13+, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
keyFeatures: Email OTP Verification: Secure two-step verification process
Modern UI: Clean and responsive design using Tailwind CSS
Type Safety: Built with TypeScript for better development experience
Real-time Feedback: Immediate user feedback for all actions
Security: 5-minute OTP expiration
Email Integration: Powered by Resend for reliable email delivery

projects.title: AI Chat Assistant
projects.description: Built a modern, real-time AI chatbot using Next.js with OpenRouter AI integration. Supports multiple cutting-edge AI models like Llama, DeepSeek, and Mistral for seamless conversations.
keyFeatures: Real-time chat interface with message history
Multi-model support with fallback mechanism
Modern UI with smooth animations and responsive design
Secure API key authentication

projects.title: Weather Forecast Application
projects.description: Built a responsive weather application that enables users to search cities and view real-time weather data along with a 5-day forecast. Utilized Open-Meteo APIs for geolocation and weather information.
keyFeatures: Autocomplete city search
Current temperature, humidity, wind, and precipitation data
5-day weather forecast in responsive card layout
Instant reloads and fast build using Vite
Responsive design for mobile and desktop
Unit tested with Jest and React Testing Library

projects.title: Photo Booth Collage App
projects.description: Built an interactive web application allowing users to take four sequential photos using their camera and generate a fun, sharable photo collage. Supports beautiful layout compositions and real-time camera interaction.
keyFeatures: Camera access and live preview
Four-photo capture sequence
Automatic collage generation
Responsive UI for mobile and desktop
Instant photo retake option

projects.title: Portfolio Status Dashboard
projects.description: Built an interactive portfolio analysis dashboard with real-time investment tracking, asset-wise performance charts, and monthly summaries. Designed for efficient financial insights and transparent reporting.
keyFeatures: Monthly portfolio performance summary
Dynamic chart visualization (bar & line charts)
Asset allocation and comparison
Responsive and accessible dashboard UI

projects.title: Portfolio Management Platform
projects.description: Developed financial management tool with real-time portfolio tracking & client onboarding. Implemented advanced analytics for investment compare & tracking.
keyFeatures: Real-time portfolio tracking
Client onboarding system
Investment analytics
Performance comparison tools

projects.title: AMS - Accounts Management System
projects.description: Created Account Management System that handles billing functionality including invoice generation, account statement uploads and detailed deposit account summaries history.
keyFeatures: Invoice generation
Account statement management
Financial analytics
Bad debt monitoring

projects.title: BookTook - Educational Platform
projects.description: Developed an interactive learning platform with containerized micro-frontend architecture. Ensured WCAG-compliant accessibility for inclusive learning experiences.
keyFeatures: Interactive learning modules
Micro-frontend architecture
WCAG compliance
